name: Smash!
description:
What Is Smash?

Smash is a fast-paced virtual reality game for Windows, Mac or Linux. It requires an Xbox One, Razer Hydra or Sixense STEM to play. You can play Smash on a monitor or with the Oculus Rift virtual reality goggles.
